ygData.subject: Re: Spell Resisted
ygData.msgSnippet: People like are the selfish type, step on anyone and all to achieve your goal. Just hope you aren t on my server. ... From: yur@ca.ibm.com
ygData.messageBody:
People like are the selfish type, step on anyone and all to achieve your
goal. Just hope you aren't on my server.

-----Original Message-----
From: yur@... [mailto:yur@...]
Sent: Friday, June 25, 1999 9:57 AM
To: eq_wizards@onelist.com
Subject: [eq_wizards] Spell Resisted


From: yur@...




I don't know about you, but i have NEVER been kicked out of a group for
being
resisted. mainly because i don't tell them i'm resisted :). Just cast ur
lvl
1 shock and since its only 6 dmg. the mob will NEVER (at least never for me)
come after you. and your group can't tell the difference in the color of
the
spells since all of them look the same. they think ur casing some high lvl
shock
heehhe.

Works fine for me so far, i sit there, no danger, no mana loss, and i get XP
and
follow their loot order just fine. I made 50 plat and gained 2 lvl in 3
days
and died only once. From the skeleton monk i mention in previous post.
When
group leader ask for mana status, just say what others say. (ie. if cleric
says
20% mana, u say 15%) that way they don't think ur doing nothing hehe.

its good trick and works well to keep our mind off how they block up at 6
lvl.
Since verant make us team up, i don't see much else we can do about it
except to
abuse the fact that others cannot see what we cast and what our mana is at
:) [
maybe this is why they don't let others see?]




re:

According to yur@...:
> I've been in Unrest since lvl 15 and most of my spells are resisted by
Dark
> Bones and Dry Bones. But its not so bad as long as your groups are doing
fine.
> Just join up and sit there to gain Xp and Loot. no danger since u don't
hit
the
> mob, so it won't come after u. Just cast it once at start of fight to see
if
> its resisted. and then start on the Radiation. I gained a lot Xp and only
died
> Once from a skeleton monk that killed someone else and then came after me
from
> behind. if they ask you why you aren't helping, just say ur resisted.
or
just
> cast a few frost shocks to pretend ur helping out :)

Then, in the middle of Unrest, you suddendly are ejected from the group. Ok,
time to Gate :(

--
